channel.title: Scar (WITH SRL 3.2 included already!) ::dowlnoad it here:: very easy!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I have had a heck of a time extracting SRL correctly and placing the right things in the right places but I finally got it working and I noticed a lot of other people were having the same problems. Soooo I decided to go ahead and make a rar with everything set up right (with srl 3.2 included and the char thing). I admit I am pretty much a noob and dont know how to write scripts or anything of my own but I just dont want to be a leecher so this is the best I could think of to contribute.
INSTRUCTIONS
step 1: If you already have scar, uninstall it from your computer. After you do, go into C:>program files and find the folder named Scar 2.03 and delete that folder.
step 2: download it [URL=http://"http://www.megaupload.com/?d=5XUWF2UP"]here[/URL]
step 3: Scan it for viruses with whatever virus software you have (if you dont trust me which you shouldnt because I am not well known)(i use avast its amazing and free)
step 4: Estract the folder "Scar 2.03" to your "program files" folder in your C: drive.
and there you go it should work. Thats as simple and clear as I know how to make it.
*note* if it does not put a new icon on your desktop for scar then just go to C:>program files> Scar 2.03 and just copy that icon and paste it on your desktop or something.
-Colton

Hello everyone, I have had a heck of a time extracting SRL correctly and placing the right things in the right places but I finally got it working and I noticed a lot of other people were having the same problems. Soooo I decided to go ahead and make a rar with everything set up right (with srl 3.2 included and the char thing). INSTRUCTIONS

step 1: If you already have scar, uninstall it from your computer. After you do, go into C:>program files and find the folder named Scar 2.03 and delete that folder.
